trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Macht <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" />-Typen für die Benutzeroberflächenautomatisierung verfügbar.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Das diesem Automatisierungspeer zugeordnete Element.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialisiert eine neue Instanz der <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />-Klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ruft die Auflistung der untergeordneten Elemente des <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> ab, das diesem <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> zugeordnet ist.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: Diese Methode wird von <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" /> aufgerufen.

trans-unit.source: The child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Die untergeordneten Elemente des <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" />, das diesem <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> zugeordnet ist.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Ein Enumerationswert, der den Befehlstyp angibt.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ruft das Steuerelementmuster für das <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> ab, das diesem <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> zugeordnet ist.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Value" /> value, this method returns an object that supports the control pattern; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Ein Objekt, von dem das Steuerelementmuster unterstützt wird, wenn <paramref name="patternInterface" /> die Werte <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform" /> oder <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Value" /> hat. Diese Methode gibt ein Objekt zurück, das das Steuerelementmuster unterstützt, andernfalls <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> is read-only
trans-unit.target: Ruft einen Wert ab, der angibt, ob das <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" />, das diesem <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> zugeordnet ist, schreibgeschützt ist.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> is not enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />, wenn <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" />, das diesem <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> zugeordnet ist, nicht aktiviert ist. Andernfalls <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Sets the keyboard focus on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Legt den Tastaturfokus auf die <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" />-Klasse fest, die dieser <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />-Klasse zugeordnet ist.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus" />.
trans-unit.target: Diese Methode wird von <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus" /> aufgerufen.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> did not get focus.
trans-unit.target: Das <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" />, das diesem <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> zugeordnet ist, ist ohne Fokus.

trans-unit.source: The value to set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> property to.
trans-unit.target: Der Wert, auf den die <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" />-Eigenschaft festgelegt wird.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Legt die <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" />-Eigenschaft des <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" />, das diesem <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> zugeordnet ist, auf den angegebenen Wert fest.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: Das <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" />, das diesem <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> zugeordnet ist, ist nicht aktiviert.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> ist <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />
trans-unit.target: Ruft die <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" />-Eigenschaft des <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> ab, das diesem <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> zugeordnet ist.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />
trans-unit.target: Die <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" />-Eigenschaft des <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" />, das diesem <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> zugeordnet ist.
